sub_title: Truly live off your passion ➡ More customers from your leads ✅ | E-Academy | Sales & Strategy Advisor | Freelancers - Digital Nomads - Entrepreneurs
summary:
➡ Who's Mike

✅ Passionate leader - with years of experience in business development, marketing, and operations. 
✅ Proven track record - of developing and motivating high-performance teams to reach organizational objectives while ensuring customer satisfaction. 
✅ Adept in driving growth - and developing innovative strategies for success. 
✅ Building strong relationships - with stakeholders and customers. 
✅ Challenger of the status quo - energized and prioritizer. 

I chase my dreams, seek challenges and enjoy every moment. I strive to achieve my goals by working hard and continuously developing myself on both a personal and professional level. In my team management I aim to inspire people by converting dreams into a concrete vision.

I have traveled the world myself and now do this with my family. I keep fit with indoor football and squash. You can find me in the snow in the winter and at our beach house in the summer.

Whatever I do, enjoyment is essential!


➡ Career 

✅ Gained international experience due to my successful studies in Africa, America and Asia. Furthermore, I have worked abroad in Austria and traveled South America. 
✅ Published my first business book globally after successfully writing a marketing strategy for the World Cup Football in South Africa, 2010. 
✅ Currently owning my own E-Academy platform. I help entrepreneurs to grow their business by increasing the conversation rate from lead to customer. The business owners I train do have leads from their socials and website yet, those leads do not actually convert into a customer. With my course, they quickly improve their skills to get more customers and truly start converting to scale their business. 
✅ About to publish my newest book in 2023, in cooperation with publisher Bookboon Learning. 
✅Although my career has my primary focus, I strive to devote time for other activities; for I believe that broad interests are the key to creating a successful environment. Hence, I have committed myself as a volunteer to several charity organizations.  


➡ Specialties;

✅ Management (Team & Product)
✅ Sales (B2B & B2C)
✅ Strategy (Business Development)
✅ Operations (Service & Support)
✅ Marketing (Online & Offline)
✅ Budget
✅ Recruitment
✅ Cultural differences


➡ Do you have opportunities to which I could add value? Contact me!

profile_positions.title: Founder & Managing Director

profile_positions.description:
➡ Responsible for Sales, Marketing, Strategy and Operations for the High School Year Exchange Program in the Dutch market. 

➡ Leading a team of Sales Consultants and Support Managers. 

➡ Member of the EF Management Team (MT). 

Key responsibilities include:

✅ Develop, execute, manage, drive & evaluate sales and marketing strategies; short- and long-term.
✅ Identify and overachieve KPI targets and expectations.
✅ Recruit, develop and retain exceptional staff, including coaching and performance management.
✅ Responsibility for the control and monitoring of budgets as well as ensuring effective expense planning and cost controls.
✅ Report to Country Manager and Product President. 
✅ Liaise with central and local functions to maximize sales and marketing activities. 

✔ Sales management including target setting, daily pipeline follow-up, support for closing sales within the team.
✔ Participate in off- and online campaigns and large sales events. 
✔ Overall responsibility for coordinating day-to-day sales activities.
✔ Analysis of sales situation, the current market, and competitors.
✔ Exploration of partnership options and cooperation with other companies and education institutions.
✔ Drive customer relationship management and retention program: Responsibility for building up new and maintain existing customer relationships and ensuring the provision of excellent customer service and support. 
✔ Crisis management and complaint handling.
✔ Cooperation with our production units in the United States, United Kingdom and Ireland.
✔ Ensure a high level of customer service and satisfaction.
profile_positions.title: Country Product Manager - High School Exchange Year

profile_positions.description:
➡ Selling SaaS solutions to corporations. 

➡ Provide strategic advice and deliver digital solutions for clients' business goals, IT challenges and new technologies. 

➡ Responsible for the Corporate Accounts. 

✅ Overscored target for 3 consecutive years. 
✅ Successfully led a task force team.          
✅ B2B Market: Senior Management & C-level

At Comparex we have the knowledge, experience and international network to bring your organization to the future. Our experts promise to give you an independent advice in the field of IT solutions and services. 

The Comparex mission is to be: "The most valuable IT solution and services organization in the Netherlands”
To us, being the 'most valuable' means serving our customers by providing solutions that always have three dimensions:

1.	Services – together with our partners, we provide packaged or managed IT services to ensure that the latest technology is used to meet the needs of our customers.

2.	Licenses – we support our customers in the purchase and management of software licenses and therefore reduce complexity and costs, thereby enabling our customers to truly benefit from the value of IT.

3.	Advice – we give strategic and solution-oriented advice to help our customers navigate their way in the digital revolution so that IT makes a transparent contribution to the achievement of their business objectives.
profile_positions.title: Int. Account Manager Corporate

profile_positions.description:
Hamilton Bright Space Management

The composition of the assortment and presentation in the stores should always be tailored to the wishes and needs of consumers. Hamilton Bright Space Management facilitates retailers and manufacturers in that matter. By visualizations of the shelf, 3D visual support of the stores and complete data analysis we can increase sales in a category, reduce inventory costs and create improved efficiency in the shop.

Hamilton Bright Space Management is the leading provider of product images, product data and category management services. Our database is widely recognized as the most complete, accurate and up-to-date database which is available to support Space Management and Category Management applications.

Thanks to our complete product database of over 45,000 images and product data, we provide you as a client with an excellent platform to deliver client-efficient, time saving and accurate output.

Services;

Space Management
E-commerce Database
Category Management
Product Data Services 

Reason for termination: seeking for a broader client (B2B) relation.

profile_positions.title: Freelance Marketeer

profile_positions.description:
Author of the book: "The Long Street Travel Centre on the way to South Africa 2010"

Book publication:

Title: 	The Long Street Travel Centre on the way to South Africa 2010. Marketing Strategy: World Cup products recommendations 	
Author:	Mike Heijstek
Release date:	January 2010
ISBN-NR.:	978-3-8383-4120-0
Publisher:	LAP-Lambert, Academic Publishing
Distribution:	Worldwide 


During my internship in Cape Town, South Africa; I was asked to design a marketing strategy. The company wished to benefit from the World Cup Football which was hosted in South Africa and Cape Town. It was my job to advice the company about how to benefit optimally from the event. I had four main tasks:

1. Customer/ market research: Who is coming to the world cup? What people, where do they stay, how much money do they spend, where are they interested in? Etc.
  
2. Find out what products were popular during previous World Cups. In short: how money was made.

3. What was the city Cape Town as well as the country South Africa doing in order to host the event perfectly? This included aspects such as infrastructure, accommodation and transportation. However; I was also in contact with the local government, the FIFA, the stadium director, television channels and the popular V&A Waterfront manager. Basically, all facets of importance.

4. The most important task: How can the previous three points be combined, together with the unique circumstances of Cape Town and South Africa to deliver a ‘custom made’ plan. It had to contain a marketing strategy about how the company could benefit from the event as well as product recommendations had to be included.

I had to think about new products that could benefit the company. The current products were not of importance, however, the central location of the company was.

Afterwards, in cooperation with LAP Publishing, I have published the report as a book internationally.
profile_positions.title: Author

volunteer_experiences.description:
As a District Coordinator I am responsible for the collection of money in the area of Southwest Alkmaar.  
I provide collectors with the needed tools and collect the money from the collectors. The entire amount will be donated to the Nierstichting, a charity organization for renal disease.
